decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A101, J361 A 210 RD and J361 A 211 RD. Planning statement prepared by Montagu Evans dated July 2016, Transport Statement prepared by ttp consulting dated July 2016. Received 20/07/2016. Transport note prepared by ttp consulting received 13/09/2016. Transport note prepared by ttp consulting dated 4th October 2016 received 05/10/2016.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The premises may be used for purpose or purposes falling within either Class B1 (a, b and c) or B8 of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) and the extent of office use (B1 a) use shall not exceed the areas defined on the submitted drawings as 'Office' and application forms unless otherwise approved by the Local Planning Authority
Condition : 4 - Prior to occupation of the building, a Delivery and Servicing Plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - Prior to occupation of the building details of cycle parking, in the form of Sheffield Stands, shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved details shall be implemented and maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 6 - Prior to occupation of the building, a Travel Plan that includes targets for modal share, measures to reduce car borne staff trips and parking surveys of the surrounding roads shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The approved plan shall be implemented and maintained as such thereafter.
description: Continued use of premises as flexible Class B1 (a, b and c) business use or Class B8 storage or distribution use
